description: This Java class is a Spring Boot REST controller managing Partner entities. It provides CRUD operations such as create, retrieve, list, update, and delete of partners via HTTP endpoints under '/api/partners'. It uses annotations for API documentation, role-based access control, and request validation.

classes.name: PartnerController
classes.description: A REST controller providing CRUD and listing endpoints for managing partner data, with role-based access control and integrated API documentation.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new partner using the provided request data; accessible by users with ADMIN or MANAGER roles.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a partner's details by its ID; accessible by authenticated users with appropriate roles.

methods.name: listByOwner
methods.description: Returns a paginated list of partners filtered by owner user ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing partner's details; restricted to ADMIN or MANAGER roles.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Performs a soft delete of a partner by marking it as deleted; accessible by ADMIN or MANAGER roles.
